title: Piyush Chaudhari
text:
WelcomeWorkEducationProjectsPublications


I am a Data Analyst working at UF Health Integrated Data Repository. My work primarily focuses on designing and developing data science pipelines to improve the coverage and quality of the data, primarily for the OneFlorida+ Clinical Research Consortium. Additionally, I also help research at UF by providing consultation for research teams, supporting feasibility and cohort discovery, and receiving and fulfilling research data requests.
Previously, I have working as a Statistical Data Analyst at Department of Epidemiology working on research projects with NIH, NCATS, CDC and NIDA to design targeted interventions.


Data Management Analyst III | UF Health IDR (02/23-now)

Liaison between IDR and OneFlorida+ Clinical Research Network
Design and develop data science pipelines to improve the coverage and quality of the data
Working as an honest broker for research data focusing on electronic health records
Running ETL pipelines for OneFlorida+ data refresh, All of Us Research Program, UF Health Tumor Registry, COVID-19 PCORI data refresh, National COVID Cohort Collaborative (N3C), OneFlorida+ i2b2 refresh and other data requests
Develop software and packages to run and validate data in OMOP Common Data Model
Conduct OneFlorida+ i2b2 trainings and workshops for hospital and research partners and working with OneFlorida+ Coordinating Center to process new user provisioning

Data Management Analyst II | UF Department of Epidemiology (06/18 - 02/23)

Lead Statistician on projects with NIH, NCATS, CDC and NIDA to design targeted interventions
Creating visualizations, hotspots and heatmap analysis for community intervention planning



Master of Science in Biostatistics
University of Florida | Gainesville, FL (2016-2018)
Bachelor of Technology in Biotechnology
Vellore Institute of Technology | India (2012 - 2016)


Coming up ……



Drug Deactivation Pouches for Primary Prevention of Opioid Overdose: Perceptions and Attitudes of Community Members in North Central Florida (accepted for publication in Journal of the American Board of Family Medicine in September 2023)
Fidler AL, Chaudhari P, Sims V, Payne-Murphy J, Fischer J, Cottler LB. Insomnia among community members in Florida: Associations with demographics, health conditions, and social support. J Clin Transl Sci. 2023 May 5;7(1):e128. doi: 10.1017/cts.2023.536. PMID: 37313380; PMCID: PMC10260341.
Austin-Datta RJ, Chaudhari PV, Cheng TD, Klarenberg G, Striley CW, Cottler LB. Electronic Nicotine Delivery Systems (ENDS) use Among Members of a Community Engagement Program. J Community Health. 2023 Apr;48(2):338-346. doi: 10.1007/s10900-022-01169-2. Epub 2022 Nov 27. PMID: 36436165; PMCID: PMC9702843.
Cheng TD, Chaudhari PV, Bitsie KR, Striley CW, Varma DS, Cottler LB. The HealthStreet Cancer Survivor Cohort: a Community Registry for Cancer Research. J Cancer Surviv. 2022 Jan 28:10.1007/s11764-022-01173-4. doi: 10.1007/s11764-022-01173-4. Epub ahead of print. PMID: 35089522; PMCID: PMC9329490.
